name: Letter
description: If you're getting sick of playing deathmatch wads where you see the other guy once every five minutes, I've got a surprise for ya. Here is a nine level compilation of the letters H,X,O,Z,W,E,Y,I, and K. These levels aren't anymore than letters, so they're VERY compact. It's been known to get over 50 frags in less than five minutes!
